    • readAt

      public String readAt(int line)
      Read at a particular line of the file
      Parameters:
      line - Line number that is to be read. The numbering is similar to indexing (First line is 0)
      Returns:
      The text at the particular line

      Returns:
      Number of lines in the file

    • readEverything

      public String readEverything()
      Reads the whole file and gives it at as a text. Lines in file is separated by new line character
      Returns:
      All the text in the file.

    • printFile

      public void printFile()
      Prints all the text in the file

    • isHidden

      public boolean isHidden()
      Checks if the file is hidden or not
      Returns:
      true if the directory or file is hidden

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns the type. Returns "directory" if it is a directory else the type of file. Example: File name: Example.jpg, Method returned "image file"
      Returns:
      media type
